Text:
Great Upload man :)
Listen just put all the comics in one huge bulk...if U have time :) Cuz I have all the time in the world and I promise I'll seed them

Thanks! That's an interesting offer. But I have 32kbyte/s upload, and I upload about 6 hours a day. We're talking about 6gig of data. I can also upload them to usenet. alt.binaries.comp. I have to think about how I'm going to do this.

How about a pack with of 50 - 100 Mad magazines in .cbr format at once? Seed until it is widly distributed (20 seeders or so) and then do another. I wouldn't mind waiting a few weeks to get ALL Mad Magazines.

This is still being seeded: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3492469

Just thought to let u know
yeah dude upload the whole stack of mad!
